description:
Logan and Wes had an agreement. Wes was a little more open to the idea of getting head from another guy, so Logan told me that if Wes went first, he would give it a try.
Wade is a viewer who contacted us about being in a movie. He loved the idea of going down on a hot straight guy, so after Wes got his blow job we let Wade loose on Logan.
We did both films on the same day... Wes with Grady and then Logan with Wade. Of course, all that hot dick sucking made Grady and Wade very, very horny...
title: Blowing Logan
